snippet: The Obama campaign has not forcefully countered Republican misinformation on the reform law.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Democrats and Pres Obama's re-election campaign for failing to forcefully counter Republican misinformation about the health care reform law.
lead_paragraph: The Obama campaign has not forcefully countered Republican misinformation on the reform law.
